products.title: Long sleeve polo
products.description: Tee off in style in this Nike Victory Long Sleeve Golf Polo Shirt, crafted with regular fold down collar and long sleeves, plus incorporated Dri-Fit technology to pull sweat away from the skin.

products.title: Techsphere hoodie
products.description: Mens Nike Golf Tech Sphere Full Zip Hoodie. A versatile mid-layer garment for use both off and on the course, constructed using a composite Sphere fleece body.

products.title: Victory polo
products.description: The new Nike Golf Victory Polo LC is a constant favourite in the Nike range. The Victory Polo features Nike's Dri-FIT fabric that wicks away sweat from your body to keep you cool dry and comfortable on those hot summers days.

products.title: Women's polo
products.description: The Nike Women's Victory Solid Polo comes crafted with Dri-Fit fabric that lifts moisture away from the skin for ultimate comfort on the course.
